chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
X: Set
Y: Type
TX: reduction_t A X
TY: reduction_t A Y
B: relation X
HB: evolve TX TX B (star B)
HB': well_founded (trans (comp (plus B) (plus (TX (T A)))))

Goal:
controlled TX TY B

Premises:
comp : forall X Y Z : Type, relation2 X Y -> relation2 Y Z -> relation2 X Z
evolve : forall A X Y : Type, reduction_t A X -> reduction_t A Y -> relation2 X Y -> relation2 X Y -> Prop
well_founded : forall A : Type, (A -> A -> Prop) -> Prop
plus : forall X : Type, relation X -> relation X
star : forall X : Type, relation X -> relation X
reduction_t = fun A : Type => reduction (Lbl A) : Type -> Type -> Type Arguments reduction_t (_ _)%type_scope
T : forall A : Type, Lbl A
controlled : forall A X Y : Type, reduction_t A X -> reduction_t A Y -> relation X -> Prop
relation = fun X : Type => relation2 X X : Type -> Type Arguments relation _%type_scope
trans : forall X Y : Type, relation2 X Y -> relation2 Y X
plus_wf_controlled : forall (A : Type) (X : Set) (Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (B : relation X), evolve TX TX B (plus B) -> well_founded (trans B) -> controlled TX TY B
ctrl_t : forall (A X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (B : relation X), controlled TX TY B -> forall R : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R (comp (star B) R) -> simulation_t TX TY (comp (star B) R)
mkctrl : forall (A X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (B : relation X), (forall R : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R (comp (star B) R) -> simulation_t TX TY (comp (star B) R)) -> (forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R (comp (star B) R) -> simulation_t TX TY S -> evolve_a TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (comp (star B) R) (comp (star B) S)) -> controlled TX TY B
ctrl_a : forall (A X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (B : relation X), controlled TX TY B -> forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R (comp (star B) R) -> simulation_t TX TY S -> evolve_a TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (comp (star B) R) (comp (star B) S)
diagram_plus_wf_1 : forall (X : Set) (S TX : relation X), diagram TX S (star TX) (plus S) -> well_founded (trans S) -> forall TX' : relation X, diagram TX' S (comp (star TX) TX') (plus S) -> strong_commute (comp (star TX) TX') (plus S)
diagram_plus_wf : forall (X : Set) (S TX : relation X), diagram TX S (star TX) (plus S) -> well_founded (trans S) -> diagram (star TX) (plus S) (star TX) (plus S)
diagram_star_wf_1 : forall (X : Set) (S TX : relation X), local_commute TX S -> well_founded (trans (comp (plus S) (plus TX))) -> forall (Y : Type) (R : relation2 X Y) (TY : relation Y), diagram TX R (star TY) (comp (star S) R) -> diagram (star TX) (comp (star S) R) (star TY) (comp (star S) R)
diagram_star_wf : forall (X : Set) (S TX : relation X), local_commute TX S -> well_founded (trans (comp (plus S) (plus TX))) -> commute TX S
diagram_plus_wf_2 : forall (X : Set) (S TX : relation X), diagram TX S (star TX) (plus S) -> well_founded (trans S) -> forall TX' : relation X, diagram TX' S (comp (star TX) TX') (plus S) -> forall (Y : Type) (R R' : relation2 X Y) (TY TY' : relation Y), diagram TX R (star TY) (comp (star S) R) -> diagram TX' R (comp (star TY) TY') (comp (star S) R') -> diagram (comp (star TX) TX') (comp (star S) R) (comp (star TY) TY') (comp (star S) R')
controlled_correct : forall (A X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (B : relation X), controlled TX TY B -> forall F G : function X Y, monotonic TX TY F -> wmonotonic TX TY G -> transparent B F -> contains F G -> contains (chaining_l (star B)) G -> forall R : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R (comp (star B) (F R)) -> evolve_a TX TY R (G R) -> simulation TX TY (UIter (UIter G) R)
comp_plus_star : forall (X : Type) (T : relation X), eeq (comp (plus T) (star T)) (plus T)
comp_star_plus : forall (X : Type) (T : relation X), eeq (comp (star T) (plus T)) (plus T)
wexpansion1_ctrl : forall (A X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (B : relation X), wexpansion1 TX TX B -> wexpansion1 TX TX B -> controlled TX TY B
diagram_star_wf_2 : forall (X : Set) (S TX : relation X), local_commute TX S -> well_founded (trans (comp (plus S) (plus TX))) -> forall (Y : Type) (R : relation2 X Y) (TY : relation Y), diagram TX R (star TY) (comp (star S) R) -> forall (X' Y' : Type) (TaX : relation2 X X') (TaY : relation2 Y Y') (S' : relation2 X' X') (R' : relation2 X' Y'), diagram TaX S (comp (star TX) TaX) (star S') -> diagram TaX R (comp (star TY) TaY) (comp (star S') R') -> diagram (comp (star TX) TaX) (comp (star S) R) (comp (star TY) TaY) (comp (star S') R')
inv_plus : forall (X : Type) (T : relation X), eeq (trans (plus T)) (plus (trans T))
plus_wf : forall (X : Set) (R : relation X), well_founded (trans R) -> well_founded (trans (plus R))
inv_star : forall (X : Type) (T : relation X), eeq (trans (star T)) (star (trans T))
comp_star_star : forall (X : Type) (T : relation X), eeq (comp (star T) (star T)) (star T)
monotonic_correct : forall (A X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), monotonic TX TY F -> forall R : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R (F R) -> simulation TX TY (UIter F R)
weak_strong_t : forall (A X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (R : relation2 X Y), simulation_t TX TY R -> diagram (Weak TX (T A)) R (Weak TY (T A)) R
mon_a : forall (A X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), monotonic TX TY F -> forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S)
Acc_clos_trans : forall (X : Set) (R : relation X) (x : X), Acc (trans R) x -> Acc (trans (plus R)) x
star_wmon : forall (A X : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X), wmonotonic TX TX (star (X:=X))
mkmon : forall (A X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), increasing F -> (forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_t TX TY (F R) (F S)) -> (forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S)) -> monotonic TX TY F
chaining_r_mon : forall (A X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (T : relation2 Y Y), simulation TY TY T -> monotonic TX TY (chaining_r T)
diagram_plus : forall (X X' : Type) (RX : relation2 X X') (R : relation X) (S : relation X'), diagram RX R RX (plus S) -> diagram RX (plus R) RX (plus S)
plus_eeq : forall (X : Type) (T' T : relation X), eeq T T' -> eeq (plus T) (plus T')
plus_incl : forall (X : Type) (T' T : relation X), incl T T' -> incl (plus T) (plus T')
wexpansion1_comp : forall (A X Y Z : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (TZ : reduction_t A Z) (R : relation2 X Y) (S : relation2 Y Z), wexpansion1 TX TY R -> wexpansion1 TY TZ S -> wexpansion1 TX TZ (comp R S)
bisimulation_comp : forall (A X Y Z : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (TZ : reduction_t A Z) (R : relation2 X Y) (S : relation2 Y Z), bisimulation TX TY R -> bisimulation TY TZ S -> bisimulation TX TZ (comp R S)
